scenes.background: Bob leans forward, rubbing his temples.
scenes.description: 'We can't just keep going in circles. How do we move forward?'

options.text: Maybe we need to assign roles based on strengths and avoid overlap.
options.analysis: You suggest a practical solution that leverages team strengths, showing good perception and social skill.

options.text: Bob, I think we need to have more structured meetings to streamline our discussions.
options.analysis: You propose a structured approach to meetings, showing good self-regulation and motivation to improve the process.

options.text: We might just need to accept that some disagreements are part of the process.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the inevitability of some conflict, showing good perception and motivation but lower empathy.
